result.arabic_text: بِنَصۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ يَنصُرُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
result.translation: at the victory granted by Allah[4]. He gives victory to whom He wills, and He is the All-Mighty, the Most Merciful.
result.footnotes: [4] i.e., Allah’s victory to the People of the Book (the Christians) over the Magians of Persia.
